name: toolbox
description: 专业的在线工具箱 - 包含JSON格式化、代码格式化、进制转换、密码生成等实用工具
author: Toolbox Team

scripts.web:serve: npm run web && vite preview --outDir docs
scripts.build:all: npm run web && npm run ext
scripts.serve: npm run web && cd docs && npx serve -s . -p 8080
scripts.pack:ext: npm run ext && cd dist && powershell Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath ./toolbox-extension-v1.0.2.zip -Force && cd ..
scripts.pack:web: npm run web && cd docs && powershell Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath ../dist/toolbox-web-v1.0.2.zip -Force && cd ..
